name: Donald Scott
description: I’ve been told that I’m hard to read. I find it easier to forgive than to forget. I’m a sucker for a woman with a great sense of humor.I’m too logical for my own good. I’m independent and strong willed,romantic at heart but hardcore on the surface. I don’t trust quickly but when I do, I trust fully. I believe that jealousy is idiocy. Negative people annoy me. I’ve served and lived in many countries. I judge myself more than others. I believe more love and honesty don’t fall easily. My favorite ice cream is Rocky Road. My life is absolutely filled with amazing people especially my son Christopher.
